job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Candidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements (skills/experience) will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunity.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Minimum Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>8 years Hands on development of Machine Learning.</li><li>4 years Provide administration support for ML environment (MLOps) which includes installation, configuration, upgrades and business continuity support in AWS Cloud</li><li>4 years Experience creating scripts to automate ML administration tasks, schedules, and deployment activities.</li><li>4 years Demonstrated experience with Linux administration and troubleshooting activities.</li><li>2 years Excellent oral and written communication skills.</li><li>2 years Effectively manage multiple responsibilities, prioritize conflicting assignments, and switch quickly between assignments, as required.</li><li>2 years Experience working in an agile sprint team.</li><li>2 years Prior experience with an HHS agency</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Educational Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>4 years Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Business or equivalent experience.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred</strong></p><ul><li>AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty certification</li></ul>
